DOC.brief_summary: The aim present study prove efficacy safety new contraceptive patch .
DOC.brief_title: EU/LA Pearl Index Study - Transdermal Contraceptive Patch
DOC.criteria: Requiring contraception Normal cervical smear Smokers old 30 year History regular cyclic menstrual period Pregnancy lactation Obesity ( BMI > 30 kg/m2 Significant skin reaction transdermal preparation sensitivity surgical / medical tape Any disease may worsen hormonal treatment ( cardiovascular , liver , metabolic ) Use contraceptive method study medication
